title: Eixample Gold - Watch Face
summary: Turn your Android Wear into a first class real looking watch (squared and round)

Hugo, a professional watch designer based in Berlin, Germany. This is the extraction of one of the most intense urban places in Europe.Tags: smartwatch, Face, wear, androidwear, watchface, watch face, smartwatchface, watch, gold, luxury, elegantCompatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360  (Moto 360).
descriptionHTML:
Let your watchface look like a real watch

Omitsis presents the most carefully designed watch face for Android Wear. ‘Eixample’ is the beginning of a series of watch faces created by T. Hugo, a professional watch designer based in Berlin, Germany.

Eixample [əˈʃampɫə]:
Inspired by this stunning quarter of Barcelona with its wide avenues, its famous grid of apartment blocks and its cosmopolitan way of life.
This is the extraction of one of the most intense urban places in Europe.

Tags: smartwatch, Face, wear, androidwear, watchface, watch face, smartwatchface, watch, gold, luxury, elegant

Compatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola 360 (Moto 360).
comments: Amazing Elegant design looks so good these are high quality faces please keep them coming and would love options to Change hand colors and a day and date can't say anything bad... Also if u need a beta tester lol I'm here for you!!
Finally a watch face that's Moto 360 friendly! I love how this face is Moto 360 friendly. It adjusts the face to account for the "flat tire" ambient sensors.
Great Watch Face But, it's a battery drainer on the LG watch R
How about an update with day date, otherwise a great looking watch Face

Best Wear watch faces I honestly belive the watch faces from Omitsis are the best on Play Store. Very elegant, great details, even in dimmed mode. Although not stated they work great on the LG G Watch R also. What would make them truly perfect would be a discreet date window.
recentChanges: Watch face has been migrated to the new Android Wear Lollipop update
